name: pwa-demo
description: A Symfony based project to demonstrate the use of PHPWA

dokku.predeploy: bin/console tailwind:build && bin/console importmap:install && bin/console asset-map:compile && bin/console  secrets:decrypt-to-local --force && bin/console doctrine:migrations:migrate -n --allow-no-migration

SECRET_TOKEN.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.
